Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Fade On Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from off to on. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Fade Off Time
Value.Help: The amount of time to take to fade the lights from on to off. A value of zero is instant (no fade), values between 1 and 127 represent 1 to 127 seconds, and values from 128 to 253 represent from 1 to 126 minutes.

Value.label: Preset Light Level
Value.Help: The dimming level of the lights when turned from off to on via the switch. If the value of 0 is used, this means the restore dimming to the last dimming value.

Value.label: LED Dim Level Indicator Timeout
Value.Help: The length of time in seconds that the level indicators should stay illuminated after the dimming level is changed. A value of 0 means the indicator is always off, and a value of 255 means the indicators are always on.

Value.label: Locator LED Status
Value.Help: Change the mode of the LED to Status Mode where the LED is illuminated when the load is On, Locator Mode where the LED is illuminated when the Load is Off, or turns off the LED completely for any other setting values.

Value.label: Load Type
Value.Help: Specify the type of load that this dimmer controls.

Value.label: Auto Changeover
Value.Help: ADVANCED PARAMETER SHOULD ONLY BE CHANGED FROM ITS DEFAULT VALUE BY A QUALIFIED HVAC PROFESSIONAL

Value.label: Auxiliary Heat Droop
Value.Help: 0 = Comfort (1 is not accepted) Integer from 2 to 15 degrees of Fahrenheit from setpoint

Value.label: Balance Point (Compressor Lockout)
Value.Help: 0 = Off integer from 5 to 65 degrees Fahrenheit in only 5 degrees increments. Other values not accepted.

Value.label: Aux Heat Lock Out (Aux Heat Outdoor Lockout)
Value.Help: 0 = Off integer from 5 to 65 degrees Fahrenheit in only 5 degrees increments. Other values not accepted.

Value.label: Aux Heat CPH (Heating cycle rate Auxiliary Heat)
EM Heat CPH (Heating cycle rate Emergency Heat)
Ventilation Filter Reminder
Value.Help: integer from 0 to 12 months. 0 = Off 3 = 3 Months 6 = 6 Months 9 = 9 Months 12 = 12 Months Other values not accepted.

Value.label: UV Bulb 1 Reminder
Value.Help: integer from 0 to 24 months. 0 = Off 6 = 6 Months 12 = 12 Months 24 = 24 Months Other values not accepted.

Value.label: UV Bulb 2 Reminder
Value.Help: integer from 0 to 24 months. 0 = Off 6 = 6 Months 12 = 12 Months 24 = 24 Months Other values not accepted.

Value.label: Temperature Offset
Value.Help: -3 = -3 deg Fahrenheit -2 = -2 deg Fahrenheit -1 = -1 deg Fahrenheit 0 = Off 1 = +1 deg Fahrenheit 2 = +2 deg Fahrenheit 3 = +3 deg Fahrenheit
